Basic Forms

  • A basic form
  • Inline forms
  • Inline forms with input add-ons
  • Horizontal forms
  • Supported controls
  • Textarea
  • Checkboxes and radios
  • Selects
  • Static control
  • Input states
  • Associating help text with form controls
  • Validation states
  • Control sizing
                
// Pseudo-code example:

// Validation States on Inputs and Checkboxes

form
    .form-group.has-success
        label.control-label
        input.form-control
        span.help-block
    .form-group.has-warning
        label.control-label
        input.form-control
    .form-group.has-error
        label.control-label
        input.form-control
    .has-success
        .checkbox
            label
                input
    .has-warning
        .checkbox
            label
                input
    .has-error
        label
            .checkbox
                input
/form

// Validation States with Optional Icons
form
    .form-group.has-success.has-feedback
        label.control-label
        input.form-control
        span.glyphicon.glyphicon-ok.form-control-feedback
        span.sr-only{success}
    .form-group.has-warning.has-feedback
        label.control-label
        input.form-control
        span.glyphicon.glyphicon-warning-sign.form-control-feedback
        span.sr-only{warning}
    .form-group.has-error.has-feedback
        label.control-label
        input.form-control
        span.glyphicon.glyphicon-remove.form-control-feedback
        span.sr-only{error}
    .form-group.has-success.has-feedback
        label.control-label
        .input-group
        span.input-group-addon
        input.form-control
        span.glyphicon.glyphicon-ok.form-control-feedback
        span.sr-only{success}
/form


// Optional icons in horizontal forms
form.form-horizontal
    .form-group.has-success.has-feedback
        label.control-label.col-sm-3
        .col-sm-9
            input.form-control
            span.glyphicon.glyphicon-ok.form-control-feedback
            span.sr-only{success}
    .form-group.has-success.has-feedback
        label.control-label.col-sm-3
        .col-sm-9
            .input-group
                span.input-group-addon
                input.form-control
                span.glyphicon.glyphicon-ok.form-control-feedback
                span.sr-only{success}
/form


// Optional icons in inline forms
form.form-inline
    .form-group.has-success.has-feedback
        label.control-label
        input.form-control
        span.glyphicon.glyphicon-ok.form-control-feedback
        span.sr-only{success}
/form
form.form-inline
    .form-group.has-success.has-feedback
        label.control-label
        .input-group
            span.input-group-addon
            input.form-control
            span.glyphicon.glyphicon-ok.form-control-feedback
            span.sr-only{success}
/form


// Optional icons with hidden .sr-only labels
form
    .form-group.has-success.has-feedback
        label.control-label.sr-only
        input.form-control
        span.glyphicon.glyphicon-ok.form-control-feedback
        span.sr-only{success}
    .form-group.has-success.has-feedback
        label.control-label.sr-only
        input-group.form-control
            span.input-group-addon
            input.form-control
            span.glyphicon.glyphicon-ok.form-control-feedback
            span.sr-only{success}
/form
